DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) CMD-193 administer intravenously ( IV ) subject advanced malignant tumor . The secondary purpose obtain preliminary information pharmacokinetics antitumor activity IV CMD-193 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Intravenous CMD-193 Subjects With Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Malignant solid tumor progress , standard treatment available Tumor expression Lewis Y antigen Cancer therapy within 28 day enrollment Pregnant breastfeed woman Unstable serious concurrent medical condition
